name: Iron Crusher
description: Attack a single enemy. Ignores 50% defense vs armored targets. Grants +50 potency vs armored targets.

name: Long Thrust
description: Attack a column of enemies with a piercing strike. Cavalry targets cannot guard against this attack. Grants +50 potency vs cavalry targets.

name: Javelin
description: Attack a single enemy. +50 potency vs flying targets.

name: Brandish
description: Attack a single enemy. Ignores 50% of the target's defense. Grants the user +1 PP if the attack hits.

name: Sanguine Attack
description: Attack a single enemy. Recover HP equal to 50% of damage dealt.

name: Shadow Thrust
description: Attack a column of enemies. Inflicts blindness.

name: Elfslayer
description: Attack a column of enemies. Inflicts -1 AP, -1 PP and -50% Defense to Elven targets.

name: Phantom Attack
description: Attack a single enemy with magical damage. Inflicts -1 PP.

name: Magic Attack
description: Attack a single enemy with magical damage.

name: Lightning Shaker
description: Attack a row of enemies with hybrid damage. Inflicts stun.

name: Icicle Dart
description: Attack a single enemy with hybrid damage. This attack always hits. Inflicts freeze.

name: Rampage
description: Attack a single enemy. Inflicts -1 AP on target and grants user -50% Defense.

name: Thunderous Thrust
description: Attack a single enemy with hybrid damage. Inflicts stun. +25 potency if user has Faeries.

name: True Thrust
description: Attack a column of enemies. This attack always hits.

name: Passive Shatter
description: Attack a column of enemies. Inflicts -1 PP.

name: Lethal Venom
description: Attack a column of enemies. Inflicts poison. Inflicts deathblow vs. poisoned foes.

name: Dragoon Dive
description: Attack all enemies. Requires charging. +50 potency vs ground targets.

name: Flame Javelin
description: Attack a single enemy. +50 potency vs. flying targets. Inflicts burn.

name: Reincarnation
description: Revive an ally to 1 HP and grant target immunity to damage for one attack.

name: Sorcerous Blow
description: Attack a single enemy with hybrid damage. Inflicts stun.

name: Healing Wind
description: Restore HP to a row of allies, healing equal to user's HP.

name: Astral Blade
description: Attack a single enemy. Unleash its true power amidst a sea of miasma.

name: Carnage
description: Attack a single enemy. Inflicts -1 AP.

name: Death Spin
description: Attack a row of enemies. Inflicts stun. +75 potency vs. afflicted targets.

name: Vicious Torment
description: Attack a single enemy twice. +75 Potency vs. afflicted targets, also grants user +1 PP if target is afflicted.

name: Flame Thrust
description: Attack a column of enemies. Inflicts burn.

name: Deadly Rush
description: Attack a single enemy four times. Inflicts stun and burn.

name: Dark Mist
description: Grants +50 Evasion and +2 PP to self.

name: Passive Curse
description: Attack a row of enemies with true strike. Inflicts -1 PP and -10 Initiative.

name: Aqua Venom
description: Attack a row of enemies with magical damage. Inflicts poison.

name: Maelstrom
description: Attack all enemies with magical damage three times. +25 Potency vs. poisoned targets.

name: Burning Edge
description: Attack a single enemy twice. Inflicts burn, grants user +1 PP if target is already burned.

name: Inferno
description: Attack a row of enemies. Ignores 50% Defense and inflicts burn, grants user +1 PP.

name: Heavy Slash
description: Attack a single enemy with high potency.

name: Penetrate
description: Attack a column of enemies. Inflicts Physical Defense -30%.

name: Omega Shatter
description: Attack a single enemy twice with high potency.

name: Primus Edge
description: Attack a single enemy with hybrid damage. If user is at 100% HP, grant +1 PP and +1 Faerie.

name: Sylphic Wind
description: Attack a row of enemies with magical damage three times. +20 potency vs flying, grants user +1 Faerie.

name: Elemental Roar
description: Attack all enemies with hybrid damage. Potency increases with Faerie count (+30 per Faerie), dismisses all Faeries.

name: Faerie Heal
description: Restore HP to a row of allies. Grants immunity to damage for one attack and +1 Faerie. MISSING: Hit rate info.

name: Lean Edge
description: Attack a single enemy. Recover 25% HP if attack hits and another 25% HP if target is defeated.

name: Cavalry Slayer
description: Attack a single enemy. Inflicts -1 AP, -1 PP and Guard Seal if target is cavalry.

name: Spinning Edge
description: Attack a row of enemies twice. Ignores 50% of Defense, grants 1 PP if enemy is defeated.

name: Holy Light
description: Attack a single enemy with magical damage. Removes all of target's buffs.

name: Curing Call
description: Restore minor HP to ally row and remove all debuffs. MISSING: Hit rate info.

name: Innocent Ray
description: Attack a row of enemies with magical damage. Removes all of targets' buffs.

name: Slice
description: Attack a single enemy. Grants user +1 PP if target is defeated.

name: Heal
description: Restore moderate HP to a single ally. MISSING: Hit rate info.

name: Divine Cross
description: Attack a single enemy twice with hybrid damage and true strike. Remove all buffs, grants user +1 PP if target is defeated.

name: Banishing Stab
description: Attack a single enemy. Remove all of the target's buffs.

name: Defensive Order
description: Grant +20% Defense to all allies.

name: Offensive Order
description: Grant +20% Attack to all allies.

name: Mystic Arrow
description: Attack a single enemy. Deals 100 potency magic damage to armored targets.

name: Sonic Shaft
description: Attack a single enemy. Deal 100% of target's initiative as extra damage.

name: Glacial Rain
description: Attack all enemies three times with charge. Inflicts freeze.

name: Vertical Edge
description: Attack a single enemy. Against flying targets, becomes Truestrike, +50 Potency and ignores 50% of Defense.

name: Wide Smash
description: Attack a row of enemies. +50 Potency if user has 100% HP.

name: Mounting Charge
description: Restore 30% Health and grant +30% Physical Attack to self.

name: Grand Smash
description: Attack all enemies. +50% Potency if user has 100% HP.

name: Vengeful Axe
description: Attack a single enemy. Damage increases the less HP that target has (Maximum Boost +100 Potency).

name: Venom Axe
description: Attack a single enemy. Inflicts poison.

name: Dark Flame
description: Attack a row of enemies with hybrid damage. Consume 30% of your Health to damage enemies. +50 Potency against debuffed targets. Inflicts burn.

name: Assaulting Lance
description: Attack a single enemy. Grants user +1 AP if target is defeated.

name: Wild Rush
description: Attack a column of enemies. Inflicts stun.

name: Pile Thrust
description: Attack a single enemy three times. Grants user +1 AP if target is defeated.

name: High Swing
description: Attack a row of enemies. Cavalry targets cannot guard against this attack, +50 potency vs. Cavalry.

name: Fatal Dive
description: Attack a column of enemies. Deals damage equal to 50% of your HP. MISSING: Hit rate info.

name: Aerial Smite
description: Attack a row of enemies. Cavalry targets cannot guard against this attack, grants user -1 AP if a target is at 100% HP.

name: Hache
description: Attack a single enemy. Grants user +1 PP if attack hits.

name: Row Heal
description: Restore moderate HP to a row of allies. MISSING: Hit rate info.

name: Saint's Blade
description: Attack a single enemy twice. +25 Potency if user is at 100% HP, Grants user +1 PP if attack hits.

name: Diving Thrust
description: Attack a single enemy. Cavalry targets cannot guard against this attack, +50 potency vs. cavalry.

name: Fire Breath
description: Attack a row of enemies. Inflicts burn.

name: Tempest Drive
description: Attack a column of enemies. Cavalry cannot guard against this attack, gains Truestrike and Critical if you are below 50% HP.

name: Reflect Magic
description: Reflects a magic attack.

name: Sacrifice
description: Covers an ally from an attack, grants user +2 PP.

effects.description: Covers an ally from an attack

name: Mirror Weakness
description: If user is debuffed, remove debuff and place removed debuff on target.

effects.description: If user is debuffed, remove debuff and place removed debuff on target

name: Accelerate
description: After being attacked, gain +20 initiative and +30 Accuracy.

name: Diurnal Guard
description: Block an attack with Medium Guard, gain +1 PP if during the day.

name: Discharge
description: Before attacking, consume all buffs to power of that attack (Boost is 25% per consumed buff).

effects.description: Before attacking, consume all buffs to power of that attack (Boost is 25% per consumed buff)

name: Sting
description: Attack a single enemy. +50 Potency if user is below 50% HP.

name: Heavy Cover
description: Cover an ally with a Heavy Guard.

name: Guardian
description: Grant +20% Phys Def and +20% Guard Rate when hit by a physical attack.

name: Row Protection
description: Grants allies in user's row +50% Phys. Def.

name: Greatshield
description: Grants user +50% Phys Def and +2 PP.

name: Row Cover
description: Cover a row of allies with a Medium Guard.

name: Warding Slash
description: Attack a single enemy. Grants user 20% Defense.

name: Shield Bash
description: Attack a single enemy. Inflicts Stun.

name: Arrow Cover
description: Cover an ally from one ranged attack and nullify all damage.

effects.description: Cover an ally from one ranged attack and nullify all damage

name: Quick Guard
description: Block a physical attack with a medium guard.

name: Defender
description: Attack a single enemy twice. Grants the user 50% Defense, Grants the user +1 PP if the attack hits.

name: Provoke
description: Force a row of enemies to attack user, grants user 50% Guard Rate.

effects.description: Force a row of enemies to attack user

name: Bear Crush
description: Attack a single enemy. Inflicts Stun.

name: Round Swing
description: Attack a row of enemies three times. Damage increase the more HP the user has (Maximum increase +50 potency).

name: Earthshaker
description: Attack all enemies. Damage increases the less HP the user has (Maximum increase +75 potency).

name: Heavy Guard
description: Block an enemy attack with Heavy Guard.

name: Nocturnal Rest
description: After attacking, recover 30% HP (amount recovered doubles at night).

name: Life Blow
description: Deal damage equal to 80% of your HP.

effects.description: Deal damage equal to 80% of your HP

name: Lightning Blade
description: Attack a single enemy with physical and magical damage. Inflicts Stun.

name: Nature's Wrath
description: Attack a column of enemies with magical damage. Inflicts -1 PP to cavalry targets.

name: Mirage Stab
description: Attack a row of enemies with hybrid damage. Grants user ability to evade 1 attack.

name: Sylphic Barrier
description: Allows ally to evade one ranged attack.

name: Remove Weakness
description: Removes debuffs and lets user evade one attack.

name: Evasive Impetus
description: When you evade an attack gain 1 AP.

name: Passive Steal
description: Attack a single enemy twice. Steal all of a target's PP if they don't guard the first hit.

name: Toxic Throw
description: Attack a single enemy twice. Inflicts Poison.

name: Evade
description: Evade an incoming attack.

name: Shadowbite
description: Attack a row of enemies twice. Inflicts Blindness as well as Initiative -20 and Evasion -20.

name: Active Steal
description: Attack a single enemy four times. Steal all of a target's AP if they don't guard the first hit.

name: Sneaking Edge
description: Attacks a single foe at the start of battle. Inflicts Guard Seal and Passive Seal.

name: Keen Edge
description: Attack a single enemy. Critical Rate +50%.

name: Impale
description: Attack a single enemy. Grants the user +1 PP if this attack defeats the target.

name: Hastened Strike
description: Attack at the start of combat.

name: Parry
description: Negate a single melee attack and gain 1 AP.

name: Meteor Slash
description: Attack a single enemy nine times. Critical Rate +30%.

name: Charged Impetus
description: After using a skill, gain 1 AP and 50% Critical Damage.

name: Piercing Lance
description: Attack a single enemy. Inflicts Guard Seal.

name: Passive Hold
description: Attack a single enemy. Inflicts Passive Seal.

name: Venom Thrust
description: Attack a column of enemies. Inflicts Poison and debuffs HP recovery by -50%. +50 potency vs poisoned targets.

name: Nocturnal Evade
description: Evade a single hit, grants +1 PP at night.

name: Shadow Pursuit
description: Follow up attack. Inflicts Blindness.

name: Weakness Hunter
description: Attacks when a target is debuffed, ignores 50% of the target's defense.

name: Heal
description: Restore moderate HP for an ally.

name: Quick Heal
description: When an ally is damaged restore minor HP to that ally.

name: Refresh
description: Remove all debuffs from a row of allies.

name: Sacred Heal
description: Restore moderate HP to allies, removes debuffs from targets.

name: Lifesaver
description: When attacked, Heal self for minor HP and grant a buff to resurrect self once.

name: Parting Resurrection
description: Revives a fallen ally with 1 HP.

name: Passive Curse
description: Inflicts -1 PP and -10 Initiative.

name: Offensive Curse
description: Inflicts -50% Phys and Mag Atk.

name: Quick Curse
description: When a foe attacks, inflict Attack -20% and Critical Seal.

name: Defensive Curse
description: Inflicts -50% Phys and Mag Defense and inflicts Guard Seal.

name: Compounding Curse
description: Increase the potency of a debuff by 1.5.

name: Cursed Swamp
description: Inflicts -10 Initiative, -30 Evasion and -1 PP to all enemies.

name: Wind Arrow
description: Attack a single enemy with hybrid damage. Inflicts Evasion -50.

name: Mystic Conferral
description: Add magic damage to ally attacks (50 Potency).

name: Icicle Arrow
description: Attack two enemies with hybrid damage. Inflicts Freeze.

name: Quick Cure
description: When an ally is debuffed, remove the debuff and grant immunity to one debuff.

name: Selfless Heal
description: When healed, restore minor HP to all allies and remove all debuffs.

name: Pure Field
description: Negates a single debuff.

name: Delaying Shot
description: Attack a single enemy four times. Inflicts Initiative -20.

name: Saint's Shot
description: Attack a single enemy. Inflicts -1 PP, lowers an additional PP on ground based targets.

name: Photon Arrow
description: Attack two enemies. Inflicts -50% Phys Def, Inflicts Passive Seal during the day.

name: Aerial Pursuit
description: Follow attack when a flying ally attacks.

name: Tailwind
description: After using a skill, grant a row of allies +10 Initiative (effect doubled for flying allies).

name: Shining Light
description: Before an enemy attacks, inflict blind on that enemy's row.

name: Overheal
description: Restore minor HP to a row of allies, can restore up to 150% of their max HP.

description: Grants double healing to a row.

description: Grants allies the ability to withstand one fatal blow.

description: Restore minor HP to all allies, grants HP regen during the day.

name: Preemptive Heal
description: Restore moderate HP to an ally before they are attacked.

description: Attack a single enemy.

description: Attack a single enemy. Inflicts Poison.
